definitions.definition: to refuse to obey a person, decision, law, situation, etc.:
examples: It is rare to see children openly defying their teachers.

definitions.definition: to be extreme or very strange and therefore impossible to believe, describe, or explain:
examples: The chaos at the airport defies description.

definitions.definition: to tell someone to do something that you think will be impossible:
examples: I defy you to prove your accusations.
